title: I need 4RP and drew a pitcher for you, Riot.
body:
I'm currently sitting at 246RP. I'm 4RP short of buying a Poro icon and I heard if pitchers are drawn, 4RP will magically appear in my account. I'm not really sure why Rito wants pitchers, but I won't question. It's filled with water too, free of charge. I might have mistaken it with some other word that sounds similar though.

Rito pls.

replies.body:
Superb attention to detail in the separate colors for the meniscus. 

Bravo.
I would personally like to see it more concave. As it stands, I cannot tell if it is a meniscus or some sort of emulsion....
I would drink said emulsion.
That'll be 4RP for the emulsion drink, sir. =P
well played
In hwat universe does the meniscus cover the entire surface of the water as a uniform layer?
Maybe the pitcher is so big it makes the meniscus so slight that seeing it from the distance we are makes it look uniform

It's 4rp for poro love.

You sir. Merry Christmas. +1
Merry Christmas to you too!
Thank you for saying, 'Merry Christmas'! It's hard to get that out of people now'a days
Happy holidays.

merry christmas to all and all {{champion:17}}  have a good night
in hell 
teemo=furry satin
I was totally expecting it to be literally a pitcher and I was not disappointed. +1 for you.

I wonder if Riot has a "free rp" jar in the name of customer relations. Sort of like a swear jar, where anytime Teeto is mentioned they have to put a penny in the jar. Then when Riot doles out the RP for things like this, they use that jar's money to keep their company's budget straight.
ROFL +1
And suddenly a Christmas miracle. Thanks Riot {{summoner:31}}
OMG they did it? :D
Yes :)

> [{quoted}](name=Hakurei Reimu,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=HAWHVAuM,comment-id=000f00000000,timestamp=2014-12-17T04:48:58.126+0000)
>
> Yes :)

congrats
Cool ! xD Thanks for the laugh

> [{quoted}](name=Hakurei Reimu,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=HAWHVAuM,comment-id=000f00000000,timestamp=2014-12-17T04:48:58.126+0000)
>
> Yes :)

{{champion:33}} Ok
Omg I see what you did thar. Gg wp sir, rito give this man 4 rp pls {{item:2004}}
rp just for the joke
I drew a pitcher too - can I have 5rp plz? :)

So...... you gotta send them a support message to get the Rp :D 

my fried did it a while back, and get his Rp.

Im currently doing the same thing actually :) 

Buying the Battlecast one. you?

Oh is that how that works?

I'm considering between Gentleman and Shadow Isles... Probably will end up flipping a coin between the two haha
Get Gentlemen. the other one im guessing will be very common.
Gentleman is certainly more classy, and the shadow isle one isn't cute like a normal poro.
Its kinda cute........ Just have to open your heart to greater possibilities!
Would you mind directing me to which category/section of support I should send a ticket to?
So you got it :D Nice! gonna log in now and equip my new one! got the rp today!

Right above your name is a button that says "Support" click that. there is a button that I think says "Repot something" or something like that. give your email, username, etc and ask what the problem is. Wish you luck!
He needs the RP Rito!
That site is a complete scam. It tricks you into sharing a link, and when you reach the required amount of referrals, it asks you to complete offers that cannot be completed to claim your RP card.

Rito is too caught up stopping Guardians of the Peace from invading them :P 

jk jk lol
{{summoner:31}}
Come on already, Riot. Give this man the Merry Christmas he deserves.
im really stupid I don't get the joke :3

i drew a farm.
but i don't want RP!
I have enough for next year! I have exactly 2015 RP ;) !!!
I love the detail on the handle. So beautiful
don't u know? Riot likes Grapehic juice, Not water.
It is a picture, as said by 'drew'. 'Drew' is past tense, meaning he's already drawn it. And it happened, to be a pitcher. Why there's not {{champion:79}}  ale in there, I don't know.

Are you crazy?   That handle won't support the weight of that much water!   I can just pitcher the mess it will make all over the kitchen.  

Merry Christmas! :P

Did Rito give you teh 4RP? 

{{summoner:31}}
